content: The twelve signs of the Zodiac are: Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius and Pisces.
translations: ita:I dodici segni dello Zodiaco sono﹕ Ariete, Toro, Gemelli, Cancro, Leone, Vergine, Bilancia, Scorpione, Sagittario, Capri
ita:I dodici segni zodiacali sono﹕ Ariete, Toro, Gemelli, Cancro, Leone, Vergine, Bilancia, Scorpione, Sagittario, Capricorn
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
